column4: Whenever I plug in my ipod, my computer recognizes it as a different device file in deb... sometimes it's /dev/sdh2 sometimes it's /dev/sdg2 and so on... therefore, I can't really put it in fstab, because fstab (as far as I know) requires that the mount point for the device being mounted in /media always be the same.
